$interpreted:
Li Hwa: Soohyeon? What are you doing here? 
Did you... hear what we were saying just now?
Soohyeon: I'm sorry, Li Hwa... I didn't mean to...
Soohyeon: But don't worry, I won't—
Water Patrol: I think the noise was coming from over here! Quickly!
Soohyeon: Quick, hide!
Li Hwa: Eh... Soohyeon...
Water Patrol: Huh? It's Soohyeon?
Soohyeon: Is something wrong? What's the problem?
Water Patrol: I was on patrol and heard some noise from over here. Like a struggle...
Soohyeon: Ah, well... I was actually just on a walk and I bumped into some beasts. They were hungry, I guess...
Soohyeon: But I chased them off, so everything's ok now~!
Water Patrol: Wow, amazing! Too bad I wasn't here to watch you fight 'em off!
Backup Patrol: Hey, you shouldn't talk to Miss Soohyeon like that...!
Soohyeon: Miss Li Hwa, they're gone now.
Li Hwa: See, Meong Sa? There are guards everywhere. You wouldn't last out there!
Meong Sa: I know, Madam Li Hwa... I'm sorry, I get a little riled up sometimes. I almost put you all in danger...
Li Hwa: As long as you know.
Li Hwa: Now, Soohyeon.
Li Hwa: Did you touch Meong Sa just now when you were helping us hide?
Li Hwa: You did, didnt you?
Soohyeon: I... Uh...
Li Hwa: She's a bewitcher, but... you touched her and don't seem to have any reaction.
Soohyeon: Um... That's because...
Li Hwa: Listen, Soohyeon... you helped us both out back there. I trust you don't mean Meong Sa any harm.
Li Hwa: So I hope you can trust us, to.
Soohyeon: ...Li Hwa, I... I...
Soohyeon: Just, please don't tell anyone else.
Young Bewitcher: Ah! Miss Li Hwa is back!
Worried Bewitcher: And you found Meong Sa? We were worried sick!
Meong Sa: I'm sorry for running off, everyone.
Young Bewitcher: Hey, who's that girl?
Young Bewitcher: Oh wait, Miss Li Hwa taught me that before I ask someone's name, I should introduce myself first... My name's Goldie. What's yours?
Soohyeon: Me? Uh, my name is...
Li Hwa: Don't worry, Goldie, this is my friend.
Li Hwa: Why don't you go tell everyone else that Meong Sa is back?
Goldie: Okay!
Li Hwa: I'm sure you're a bit confused, Soohyeon.
Soohyeon: There are so many bewitchers here...
Li Hwa: Yes... I've spent a lot of time getting them all here. Thankfully my friend is letting me use her palace while she's away.
Soohyeon: It must be nice and hidden, here underwater... But still, if you're discovered...
Li Hwa: I know we won't be able to stay here forever.
Li Hwa: The second they're found out here, they'll be sentenced to death. Most of them can only be like you and hide their identities.
Li Hwa: Even if they aren't found out, this problem is only going to get worse and worse.
Li Hwa: So I need to find a way to cure them as soon as I can.
Soohyeon: Cure them? You mean...
Soohyeon: You're trying to find a way to break the curse?
Li Hwa: Yes, well... I know most people in the east see this as a curse...
Li Hwa: But I don't.
Soohyeon: You don't? But bewitchers and the bewitched... What are they if they're not cursed?
Li Hwa: Well, from what I've gathered from my research at the Rune Academy, this all may be caused by a disturbance in soul energy.
Soohyeon: A disturbance in... soul energy?
Li Hwa: Yes, everything is created from soul energy in some capacity, but...
Li Hwa: I'm not sure what exactly is going wrong with the bewitchers' soul energy. I still have more research to do...
Soohyeon: So you mean, if you keep studying and find some kind of cure, then... we won't die?
Soohyeon: So, how long do you think you'll need to do your research?
Li Hwa: To be honest with you, I've hit a bit of a roadblock.
Li Hwa: And I've got to take care of these guys, since they're all stuck inside. I'm just so busy all the time...
Soohyeon: Then let me help you!
Li Hwa: Help? Ah... Well, I could actually use some help...
Li Hwa: But if your mother found out...
Soohyeon: I'll be super careful! You can trust me!
Soohyeon: Please, Miss Li Hwa... I see all you're doing for everyone here. I can't stand by and do nothing!
Soohyeon: Let me take some of your burden.
Li Hwa: If you truly want to help, then I won't say no. But you have to promise to take care of yourself, first and foremost.
Soohyeon: Thank you, Miss Li Hwa.
Li Hwa: Please, just call me Li Hwa, now. We're going to be working together, after all.
Li Hwa: Let's do our best to find a cure!
Soohyeon: Okay!

Model.Text:
Soohyeon? What are you doing here? 
Did you... hear what we were saying just now?
I'm sorry, Li Hwa... I didn't mean to...
But don't worry, I won't—
I think the noise was coming from over here! Quickly!
Quick, hide!
Eh... Soohyeon...
Huh? It's Soohyeon?
Is something wrong? What's the problem?
I was on patrol and heard some noise from over here. Like a struggle...
Ah, well... I was actually just on a walk and I bumped into some beasts. They were hungry, I guess...
But I chased them off, so everything's ok now~!
Wow, amazing! Too bad I wasn't here to watch you fight 'em off!
Hey, you shouldn't talk to Miss Soohyeon like that...!
Miss Li Hwa, they're gone now.
See, Meong Sa? There are guards everywhere. You wouldn't last out there!
I know, Madam Li Hwa... I'm sorry, I get a little riled up sometimes. I almost put you all in danger...
As long as you know.
Now, Soohyeon.
Did you touch Meong Sa just now when you were helping us hide?
You did, didnt you?
She's a bewitcher, but... you touched her and don't seem to have any reaction.
Um... That's because...
Listen, Soohyeon... you helped us both out back there. I trust you don't mean Meong Sa any harm.
So I hope you can trust us, to.
...Li Hwa, I... I...
Just, please don't tell anyone else.
Ah! Miss Li Hwa is back!
And you found Meong Sa? We were worried sick!
I'm sorry for running off, everyone.
Hey, who's that girl?
Oh wait, Miss Li Hwa taught me that before I ask someone's name, I should introduce myself first... My name's Goldie. What's yours?
Me? Uh, my name is...
Don't worry, Goldie, this is my friend.
Why don't you go tell everyone else that Meong Sa is back?
Okay!
I'm sure you're a bit confused, Soohyeon.
There are so many bewitchers here...
Yes... I've spent a lot of time getting them all here. Thankfully my friend is letting me use her palace while she's away.
It must be nice and hidden, here underwater... But still, if you're discovered...
I know we won't be able to stay here forever.
The second they're found out here, they'll be sentenced to death. Most of them can only be like you and hide their identities.
Even if they aren't found out, this problem is only going to get worse and worse.
So I need to find a way to cure them as soon as I can.
Cure them? You mean...
You're trying to find a way to break the curse?
Yes, well... I know most people in the east see this as a curse...
But I don't.
You don't? But bewitchers and the bewitched... What are they if they're not cursed?
Well, from what I've gathered from my research at the Rune Academy, this all may be caused by a disturbance in soul energy.
A disturbance in... soul energy?
Yes, everything is created from soul energy in some capacity, but...
I'm not sure what exactly is going wrong with the bewitchers' soul energy. I still have more research to do...
So you mean, if you keep studying and find some kind of cure, then... we won't die?
So, how long do you think you'll need to do your research?
To be honest with you, I've hit a bit of a roadblock.
And I've got to take care of these guys, since they're all stuck inside. I'm just so busy all the time...
Then let me help you!
Help? Ah... Well, I could actually use some help...
But if your mother found out...
I'll be super careful! You can trust me!
Please, Miss Li Hwa... I see all you're doing for everyone here. I can't stand by and do nothing!
Let me take some of your burden.
If you truly want to help, then I won't say no. But you have to promise to take care of yourself, first and foremost.
Thank you, Miss Li Hwa.
Please, just call me Li Hwa, now. We're going to be working together, after all.
Let's do our best to find a cure!
Okay!

I'm just so busy all the time...","sfxName":"t0180s5_story_005","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0182_002_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3479","IconName":"t3479s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Then let me help you!","sfxName":"t0182sx_story_019","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0182_002_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Help? Ah... Well, I could actually use some help...","sfxName":"t0180s5_story_007","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0182_002_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But if your mother found out...","sfxName":"t0180s5_story_008","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0182_002_dialog_english##_27_002","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3479","IconName":"t3479s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'll be super careful! You can trust me!","sfxName":"t0182sx_story_021","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0182_002_dialog_english##_27_003","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3479","IconName":"t3479s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Please, Miss Li Hwa... I see all you're doing for everyone here. I can't stand by and do nothing!","sfxName":"t0182sx_story_003","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0182_002_dialog_english##_27_004","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3479","IconName":"t3479s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Let me take some of your burden.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0182_002_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If you truly want to help, then I won't say no. But you have to promise to take care of yourself, first and foremost.","sfxName":"t0180s5_story_001","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0182_002_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3479","IconName":"t3479s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Thank you, Miss Li Hwa.","sfxName":"t0182sx_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0182_002_dialog_english##_29_001","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Please, just call me Li Hwa, now. We're going to be working together, after all.","sfxName":"t0180s5_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0182_002_dialog_english##_29_002","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Let's do our best to find a cure!","sfxName":"t0180s5_story_017","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0182_002_dialog_english##_29_003","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3479","IconName":"t3479s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Okay!","sfxName":"t0182sx_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
